slide.title: Automating Form Submissions
slide.blurb: cURL also automates the process of posting data with HTTP
slide.example:
<?php
$ch = curl_init ('http://www.playboy.com/new_member.cgi');
curl_setopt ($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, 
             array ('firstname' => 'Andrei',
                    'lastname' => 'Zmievski'));
curl_exec ($ch);
curl_close ($ch);
?>
